content: lozenge cowl by peg mayor ravelry ragingwool instagram @pegmayor this cowl knits up quickly and is easily modified to your own preference on sizing use two variegated yarns for maximum texture or use one variegated and one solid for a less busy look finished size 11 tall 26 diameter at the bottom and 20 at the top you can adjust this to make any size cowl you want i happen to like cowls that sit close to my neck to make larger circumference add additional stitches in quantities of 10 yarn two 200-yard skeins of sport weight yarn in coordinating or contrasting colors sample is knit in spincycle dyed in the wool colorways pick your poison mc -- blue and salty dog cc -- yellow finished sample had some extra of both yarns so sizing up should not require any more skeins gauge 5 4 stitches to the inch on #5 needles 16-inch or 20-inch circular needle required gauge is only critical when determining your sizing adjust needle sizes to get the fabric look you prefer slip_stitch pattern a used at the bottom on a multiple of 10 stitches **always slip as if to purl** row 1-4 cc k2 slip 3 *k7 slip 3* repeat ** until last 5 stitches k5 row 5 mc k2 slip 3 *k7 slip 3* repeat ** until last 5 stitches k5 row 6 mc purl all stitches including slipped stitches row 7 mc knit all stitches row 8 mc purl all stitches row 9-12 cc *k7 slip 3* repeat ** to the end row 13 mc *k7 slip 3* repeat ** to the end row 14 mc purl all stitches including slipped stitches row 15 mc knit all stitches row 16 mc purl all stitches slip_stitch pattern b used at the top on a multiple of 8 stitches **always slip as if to purl** row 1-4 cc *k6 slip 2* repeat ** until the end row 5 mc *k6 slip 2* repeat ** until the end row 6 mc purl all stitches including slipped stitches row 7 mc knit all stitches row 8 mc purl all stitches row 9-12 cc k2 slip 2 *k6 slip 2* repeat ** until last 4 stitches k4 row 13 mc k2 slip 2 *k6 slip 2* repeat ** until last 4 stitches k4 row 14 mc purl all stitches including slipped stitches row 15 mc knit all stitches row 16 mc purl all stitches pattern instructions 1 using mc cast on 140 stitches join in the round and do 6 row of garter stitch 2 begin slip_stitch pattern a complete row 1-16 twice and then do row 1-7 once more you now have 5 sets of ovals and just finished a knit row in mc 3 for row 8 this time you will be decreasing evenly across
